summary: Implemented new “Share & List” UI with a listing instructions section and share utilities, plus centralized app metadata and share-intent URL builders. Some REQ-9 consistency requirements and parts of REQ-8 (footer icon href replacements/new-tab behavior) are not verifiable from the provided truncated diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the footer social icons’ placeholder (#) hrefs with real share-intent URLs that share the current app URL, opening in a new tab.
missing_requirements.reason: App.tsx is truncated before the footer/social icon render code. While share-intent builders are imported, the diff summary does not include the actual anchor/link href updates (removal of href="#"), target="_blank", rel="noopener noreferrer", or confirmation that the current app URL is prefilled.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the app name and a short one-sentence description are displayed consistently in the header/hero/footer and reused in the listing section without conflicting copy.
missing_requirements.reason: Header title text appears hardcoded as “TikTok → YouTube” rather than using appName (“TikTok to YouTube Converter”), and the hero imports appName but does not use it. Footer display of app name/description is not shown in the provided diff snippet.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an email share-intent URL builder (mailto:) in shareLinks utilities.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-8 only asks to update footer social icons to real share-intent URLs; email sharing is not explicitly requested in the BuildRequest.
